TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Login extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl

summary.span: 提供使用者介面 (UI) 項目以登入網站。

span.span: Provides user interface (UI) elements for logging in to a Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [樣式和範本Style and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [驗證群組Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [套用 CSS 樣式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項是複合控制項，以提供網站上的使用者進行驗證所需所有常見的 UI 元素。The control is a composite control that provides all the common UI elements needed to authenticate a user on a Web site. 下列三個項目所需的所有登入案例：The following three elements are required for all login scenarios: - 唯一的使用者名稱來識別使用者。A unique user name to identify the user. - 用來驗證使用者的身分識別密碼。A password to verify the identity of the user. - 登入按鈕以登入資訊傳送至伺服器。A login button to send the login information to the server. 控制項也提供下列選擇性 UI 項目來支援其他函數：The control also provides the following optional UI elements that support additional functions: - 密碼提示的連結。A link for a password reminder. - 記住我 核取方塊保留工作階段之間的登入資訊。A Remember Me checkbox for retaining the login information between sessions. - 無法登入的使用者說明連結。A Help link for users who are having trouble logging in. - 將使用者重新導向到註冊網頁註冊新的使用者連結。A Register New User link that redirects users to a registration page. - 登入表單顯示的指示文字。Instruction text that appears on the login form. - 當使用者沒有填寫使用者名稱或密碼欄位中選擇 登入按鈕時所顯示的自訂錯誤文字。Custom error text that appears when the user clicks the login button without filling in the user name or password fields. - 登入失敗時顯示自訂的錯誤文字。Custom error text that appears if the login fails. - 自訂動作的登入成功時，就會發生。A custom action that occurs when login succeeds. - 若要隱藏登入控制項，如果使用者已經登入至站台的一種方式。A way to hide the login control if the user is already logged in to the site. 顯示可控制所需的、 哪些是選擇性的資料表，請參閱屬性。For a table showing which controls are required and which are optional, see property. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 中可用的登入控制項組，請參閱[ASP.NET 登入控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能繼續。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing. 如需登入控制項及成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). > [!IMPORTANT] > 接受使用者輸入可能會造成安全性威脅。Accepting user input is a potential security threat. 惡意使用者可以傳送資料，目的是要公開的弱點可能會或執行程式，嘗試產生的密碼。Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords. 為了提高安全性，處理使用者輸入時，您應該使用您的控制項的驗證功能，並保護您的控制項設定的任何資料提供者。To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)，[的 Web 應用程式的基本安全性作法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)，和[保護的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad), and [Securing Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7). 控制項使用成員資格提供者以取得使用者認證。The control uses a membership provider to obtain user credentials. 除非另外指定，否則控制項使用 Web.config 檔案中定義的預設成員資格提供者。Unless you specify otherwise, the control uses the default membership provider defined in the Web.config file. 若要指定不同的提供者，設定應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中定義的屬性設為其中的成員資格提供者名稱。To specify a different provider, set the property to one of the membership provider names defined in your application's Web.config file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[成員資格提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)。For more information, see [Membership Providers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f). 如果您想要使用的自訂驗證服務，您可以使用方法來呼叫服務。If you want to use a custom authentication service, you can use the method to call the service. ## 樣式和範本Styles and Templates 外觀控制項是可以完全自訂，透過範本和樣式設定。The appearance of the control is fully customizable through templates and style settings. 所有的 UI 文字訊息也會透過屬性的可自訂類別。All UI text messages are also customizable through properties of the class. 預設介面文字自動會依據伺服器上的地區設定來當地語系化。The default interface text is automatically localized based on the locale setting on the server. 如果控制項自訂範本，然後在屬性和屬性會被忽略。If the control is customized with templates, then the property and the property are ignored. 在此案例中，設定屬性和每個範本子控制項的直接的屬性。In this case, set the property and the property of each template child control directly. 控制由文字方塊中，例如屬性和，都可以存取頁面生命週期的所有階段。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 藉由使用者所做的任何變更會採用控制項文字方塊所觸發的事件。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event triggered by the textboxes. > [!NOTE] > 如果您將內嵌控制物件、 明確設定中的屬性`Page_Load`事件處理常式，如果使用者驗證。If you embed the control in a object, explicitly set the property in a `Page_Load` event handler if the user is authenticated. 控制項不會不會自動前進到下一步在此案例中的物件。The control does not automatically advance to the next object in this scenario. 下表列出控制樣式屬性，並說明每個樣式屬性會影響哪些 UI 項目。The following table lists the control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects. 如需哪些屬性的每個樣式套用至清單，請參閱個別的樣式屬性的文件。For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties. |樣式屬性Style property|受影響的 UI 項目UI element affected| |--------------------|-------------------------| ||在控制項內容控制項的框線之間的空間。The space between the control contents and the control's border.| ||記住我 核取方塊。Remember Me checkbox.| ||登入失敗的文字。Login failure text.| ||告訴使用者如何使用控制項的頁面上的指示文字。Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.| ||所有輸入的欄位，例如文字方塊的標籤。Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||文字項目輸入的欄位。Text entry input fields.| ||標題文字。Title text.| ||登入嘗試因驗證錯誤而失敗時，對使用者顯示的文字。Text displayed to the user when a login attempt is unsuccessful due to validation errors.| ||連結至其他網頁。Links to other pages.| ||登入 按鈕。Login button.| ## 驗證群組Validation Groupings 和屬性有送出頁面，但未提供必要的資訊時，防止使用者與其相關聯的控制項。The and properties have controls associated with them to prevent users from submitting the page without providing required information. 控制項使用的驗證群組，以便與相同的頁面上其他欄位個別驗證控制項。The control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the control can be validated separately. 根據預設，屬性控制項當做驗證群組名稱。By default, the property of the control is used as the name of the validation group. 例如，識別碼為"Login1"的控制項將會使用"Login1"的驗證群組名稱。For example, a control with the ID "Login1" will use a validation group name of "Login1". 如果您想要設定的驗證群組控制項是的一部分，您必須將控制項樣板和變更的驗證群組名稱。If you want to set the validation group that the control is part of, you must template the control and change the validation group name. ## 套用 CSS 樣式Applying CSS Styles 控制項可讓您在標記中指定的 CSS 樣式規則。The control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup. 如果您使用範本自訂外觀控制項，您可以指定 CSS 樣式中的範本中的標記。If you use templates to customize the appearance of the control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates. 在此情況下，額外外部資料表不是必要的。In that case, no extra outer table is required. 您可以防止資料表呈現的設定屬性`false`。You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the property to `false`. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用，以登入的網站提供的 UI 控制項。The following code example uses a control to provide a UI for logging in to a Web site. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginClass/CS/loginclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginClass/VB/loginclassvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充控制項。The following code example demonstrates how you can extend the control. `CustomLogin`控制項包含控制項，讓使用者選擇哪一個與驗證的成員資格提供者。The `CustomLogin` control includes a control that lets users choose which membership provider they are authenticated with. （在 Web.config 中未設定這些提供者）。在方法，屬性設定為選取值控制項。(These providers are configured in Web.config.) In the method, the property is set to the selected value of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Controls.CustomLogin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.CustomLogin/CS/FarmasLogin.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Controls.CustomLogin#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.CustomLogin/VB/FarmasLogin.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生於使用者已驗證時。

span.span: Occurs when a user is authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者使用時，就會引發事件控制項來登入網站。The event is raised when a user uses the control to log in to a Web site. 可以使用自訂驗證配置來驗證使用者的事件。Custom authentication schemes can use the event to authenticate users. > [!NOTE] > 當使用者使用控制項來登入的網站，檢視狀態中的所有資料和所有的張貼資料都會遺失。When a user uses the control to log in to a Web site, all data in the view state and all post data is lost. 不會執行動作中的依賴檢視狀態的事件。Do not perform actions in the event that rely on the view state. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用呼叫站台特有的自訂驗證程式碼的事件。The following code example uses the event to call site-specific custom authentication code. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginAuthenticate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginAuthenticate/CS/loginauthenticatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginAuthenticate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginAuthenticate/VB/loginauthenticatevb.aspx#1)]

span.para: 應該將自訂驗證配置屬性表示使用者已經過驗證。當使用者提交他或她的登入資訊控制第一個引發事件，則事件，最後再事件。

Custom authentication schemes should set the property to to indicate that a user has been authenticated. When a user submits his or her login information, the control first raises the event, then the event, and finally the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得的參考物件，以便用來變更外觀控制項的記住我 核取方塊。The property gets a reference to a object that you use to change the appearance of the control's Remember Me check box. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `CheckBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CheckBoxStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CheckBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CheckBoxStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 屬性定義的外觀屬性。The property defines the appearance of the property. 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併控制項。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 中所做的任何設定屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定控制項。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 下列控制項樣式屬性會覆寫設定：The following control style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 當您使用範本來定義外觀控制項，屬性沒有任何作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設定 記住我所檢查的文字色彩為藍色方塊和字型樣式為斜體設定屬性的屬性所參考物件屬性。The following code example sets the text color of the Remember Me check box to blue and the font style to italic by setting properties of the object referenced by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginCheckBoxStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginCheckBoxStyle/CS/logincheckboxstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginCheckBoxStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginCheckBoxStyle/VB/logincheckboxstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含的站台的 [註冊] 頁面的連結文字。The property contains the text of a link to the registration page for the site. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定成功登入嘗試時所顯示的頁面。The property specifies the page that is displayed when a login attempt is successful. 預設行為控制項是要讓使用者返回到參照的頁面，或頁面中定義`defaultUrl`Web.config 檔案中項目的屬性。The default behavior of the control is to return the user to the referring page, or to the page defined in the `defaultUrl` attribute of the element in the Web.config file. 屬性會覆寫的預設行為控制項，並將`defaultUrl`組態檔中所做的設定。The property overrides the default behavior of the control, as well as the `defaultUrl` setting made in the configuration file. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性。The following code example sets the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`中, 包含的文字屬性隨即顯示在頁面上，以及 [記住我] 核取方塊。When the property is set to `true`, the text contained in the property is displayed on the page, along with a Remember Me check box. 當使用者選取 [記住我] 核取方塊，驗證 cookie 傳送至其電腦持續發生，以便未來造訪網站上的自動驗證使用者。When the user selects the Remember Me check box, the authentication cookie sent to his or her computer persists so that the user is automatically authenticated on future visits to the site. 值屬性設定選取 [記住我] 核取方塊。The value of the property is set by the selection in the Remember Me check box. 如果是`false`記住我 核取方塊不會顯示在頁面上，使用者會有任何方式來控制是否在驗證 cookie 持續發生，或不。If is `false`, a Remember Me check box is not displayed on the page and the user has no way to control whether the authentication cookie persists or not. 您仍然可以設定屬性`true`傳送給使用者的瀏覽器的永續性驗證 cookie，而不會顯示核取方塊。You can still set the property to `true` to send a persistent authentication cookie to the user's browser without displaying the check box. > [!NOTE] > 沒有固有的安全性風險上使用者的瀏覽器設定持續性的驗證 cookie。There are inherent security risks with setting a persistent authentication cookie on a user's browser. 您應該判斷是否可以接受您的網站將這些安全性風險。You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site. 如果您設定屬性`true`和屬性`false`、 造訪的網站從公用的瀏覽器，如咖啡館比方說，可以不小心留下永續性的驗證 cookie 的網際網路使用者和下一步瀏覽器的使用者將能夠存取您的網站，使用前一位使用者的認證。If you set the property to `true` and the property to `false`, users visiting your Web site from public browsers, as in Internet cafes for example, can accidentally leave persistent authentication cookies behind and the next user of the browser will be able to access your Web site using the previous user's credentials. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會停用 [記住我] 核取方塊設定屬性`false`。The following code example disables the Remember Me check box by setting the property to `false`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性指定的登入嘗試失敗時顯示的字串。The property specifies the string that is displayed when a login attempt fails. 如果您定義的範本控制項，您可以指定要顯示範本上的位置屬性使用控制項，並提供可控制"FailureText 」 的識別碼。If you define a template for the control, you can indicate where on the template to display the property by using a control and giving that control the ID "FailureText". 當您使用範本，屬性不會套用到中指定的文字屬性。When you use a template, the property is not applied to the text specified in the property. 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的目前地區設定來當地語系化。The default text for the property is localized based on the server's current locale. > [!NOTE] > 基於安全性理由，登入失敗文字不應該包含特定失敗的原因。For security reasons, the login failure text should not include a specific reason for the failure. 比方說，這類的錯誤訊息 」 不適用於使用者的密碼\<使用者名稱 > 」 會顯示給潛在攻擊者，\<使用者名稱 > 是在系統上的使用者。For example, an error message such as "Password not valid for user \" reveals to a potential attacker that \ is a user on the system. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 顯示安全的錯誤訊息](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa)。For more information, see [How to: Display Safe Error Messages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa). 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性 」 您登入時時發生錯誤。The following code example sets the property to "There was an error while logging you in. 請再試一次。 」。Please try again.". remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得的參考物件，以便用來變更登入失敗文字的外觀。The property gets a reference to a object that you use to change the appearance of login failure text. 預設值是以紅色顯示的文字。The default is to display the text in red. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 屬性定義的外觀屬性。The property defines the appearance of the property. 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併控制項。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 中所做的任何設定屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定控制項。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 下列控制項樣式屬性會覆寫設定：The following control style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 當您使用範本來定義外觀控制項，屬性沒有任何作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例指定登入失敗文字樣式，藉由設定背景和文字色彩屬性中所參考物件屬性。The following code example specifies the login failure text style by setting the background and text color properties of the object referenced in the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含範本，以定義如何控制項顯示給使用者。The property contains the template that defines how the control is displayed to the user. 下表列出使用中的必要和選擇性控制項控制項範本。The following table lists the required and optional controls used in a control template. |識別碼或命令名稱ID or command name|控制項類型Control type|必要/選用Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|實作的任何控制項，包括，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|必要Required| |`Password`|實作的任何控制項，包括，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|必要Required| |`RememberMe`||OptionalOptional| |`FailureText`|實作的任何控制項。Any control that implements .|OptionalOptional| |`Login`|造成事件反昇任何控制項。Any control that causes event bubbling.|OptionalOptional| 控制會擲回例外狀況，如果版面配置範本未包含必要的控制項。The control throws an exception if the layout template does not contain the required controls. 如果您提供的選擇性控制識別碼至錯誤的類型; 的控制項，會擲不回任何例外狀況不過，如果控制項之後忽略由控制項。No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the control. 登入控制項可以是任何控制項之事件反昇，例如， ，或。The login control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as , , or . 控制項的命令名稱屬性必須設定為"Login"。The control's command name property must be set to "Login". 當範本用來控制項，只有下列屬性會影響控制項的行為：When a template is used for the control, only the following properties affect the behavior of the control: - 所有屬性都繼承自。All properties inherited from . (如需詳細資訊，請參閱控制成員資料表。)(For details, see the control members table.) - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. 所有其他屬性為非使用中，範本已設定控制項。All other properties are inactive when a template is set for the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的範本控制項。The following code example creates a template for the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 發生於使用者登入網站且已經過驗證時。

span.span: Occurs when the user logs in to the Web site and has been authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證提供者會檢查使用者的認證，並將傳送至瀏覽器中的下一個回應的驗證 cookie 會排入佇列之後，就會引發事件。The event is raised after the authentication provider checks the user's credentials and the authentication cookie is queued to send to the browser in the next response. 使用事件來提供額外的處理，例如使用者通過驗證後存取每個使用者資料。Use the event to provide additional processing, such as accessing per-user data, after the user is authenticated. 當使用者提交他或她的登入資訊控制第一個引發事件，則事件，最後再事件。When a user submits his or her login information, the control first raises the event, then the event, and finally the event. > [!NOTE] > 當使用者使用控制項來登入的網站，檢視狀態中的所有資料和所有的張貼資料都會遺失。When a user uses the control to log in to a Web site, all data in the view state and all post data is lost. 不會執行動作中的依賴檢視狀態的事件。Do not perform actions in the event that rely on the view state. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用呼叫的站台特有的方法，會保留記錄的使用者登入事件。The following code example uses the event to call a site-specific method that keeps a record of user logins. span.span: The text used for the control's login button.
The default is "Login".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含顯示的文字控制項的登入按鈕。The property contains the text displayed for the control's login button. 值而定屬性，屬性可顯示為文字的按鈕，以替代並不會轉譯影像的瀏覽器中的映像或連結的文字顯示的文字。Depending on the value of the property, the property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link. 下表描述如何不同值會影響屬性。The following table describes how the different values affect the property. | 設定 setting|如何屬性使用。How the property is used.| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||為按鈕`Text`屬性。As the button's `Text` property.| ||為影像的替代文字。As alternative text for the image.| ||做為連結文字。As link text.| 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在文字屬性的值會影響屬性。The following code example shows how the text in the property is affected by the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). In the method, the property is set to the selected value of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 取得或設定值，指示是否將永續性驗證 Cookie 傳送至使用者的瀏覽器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to send a persistent authentication cookie to the user's browser.

value.span: 表示傳送永續性驗證 Cookie，否則為 。

span.span: to send a persistent authentication cookie; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`，驗證 cookie 傳送給使用者的電腦設定為讓使用者下一步造訪的網站時所使用的永續性 cookie 在 50 年後到期。When the property is `true`, the authentication cookie sent to the user's computer is set to expire in 50 years, making it a persistent cookie that will be used when the user next visits the Web site. 因為驗證 cookie 會存在於使用者的電腦上，使用者會被視為已通過驗證，並不會再次登入網站。Because the authentication cookie will be present on the user's computer, the user will be considered already authenticated and will not have to log in to the Web site again. 當屬性是`true`、屬性設定為對使用者顯示核取方塊的值。When the property is `true`, the property is set to the value of the check box displayed to the user. 如果屬性是`false`記住我 核取方塊不會顯示在頁面上，使用者會有任何方式來控制是否驗證 cookie 會持續。If the property is `false`, a Remember Me check box is not displayed on the page and the user has no way to control whether the authentication cookie is persistent. 如果屬性是`true`，驗證 cookie 傳送給使用者的瀏覽器將會是永續性 cookie。If the property is `true`, the authentication cookie sent to the user's browser will be a persistent cookie. 如果使用者登出網站使用控制項永續性 cookie 會清除從使用者的電腦和使用者就必須在下次造訪登入網站。If the user logs out of the Web site using the control, the persistent cookie is cleared from the user's computer and the user will have to log in to the site on the next visit. > [!NOTE] > 沒有固有的安全性風險上使用者的瀏覽器設定持續性的驗證 cookie。There are inherent security risks with setting a persistent authentication cookie on a user's browser. 您應該判斷是否可以接受您的網站將這些安全性風險。You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site. 如果您設定屬性`true`和屬性`false`、 造訪的網站從公用的瀏覽器，如咖啡館比方說，可以不小心留下永續性的驗證 cookie 的網際網路使用者和下一步瀏覽器的使用者將能夠存取您的網站，使用前一位使用者的認證。If you set the property to `true` and the property to `false`, users visiting your Web site from public browsers, as in Internet cafes for example, can accidentally leave persistent authentication cookies behind and the next user of the browser will be able to access your Web site using the previous user's credentials. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性定義的使用者名稱和密碼外觀控制項控制項。The property defines the appearance of the User name and Password controls in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 屬性定義的使用者名稱和密碼文字方塊的外觀。The property defines the appearance of the user name and password text boxes. 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併控制項。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 中所做的任何設定屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定控制項。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 下列樣式屬性會覆寫設定：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 當您使用範本來定義外觀控制項，屬性沒有任何作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定使用者名稱和密碼的背景和文字色彩屬性來設定控制項所參考物件屬性。The following code example sets the background and text colors of the User name and Password controls by setting properties on the object referenced by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含錯誤訊息中顯示登入頁面上的控制項。The property contains the error message displayed in a control on the login page. 屬性值在僅當下列條件成立時，才會顯示：The property value is displayed only when both the following conditions are true: - A控制項存在於頁面上。A control is present on the page. - 使用者名稱 文字方塊中的使用者保留空白。The User name text box is left blank by the user. 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). 同時和值包裝在驗證群組內控制項。Both the and values are wrapped in a validation group within the control. 若要顯示，這些值屬性控制項必須設為屬性控制項。For these values to display, the property of the control must be set to the property of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來顯示錯誤訊息中指定屬性。The following code example demonstrates using a control to display the error message specified in the property. summary.span: 取得定義錯誤訊息外觀之 屬性集合的參考，該錯誤訊息與 控制項使用的驗證器相關聯。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of error messages associated with validators used by the control.
A containing the style settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|錯誤訊息的背景色彩。The color behind the error messages. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|錯誤訊息周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the error messages. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|錯誤訊息周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the error messages. 樣式可以是 「 無 」，「 點 」、 「 虛線樣式 」、 「 單色 」、"Double"、"Groove"、"立體浮凸 」、 「 插入 」 或 「 開始 」。The style can be "None", "Dotted", "Dashed", "Solid", "Double", "Groove", "Ridge", "Inset", or "Outset". 預設為"NotSet"。The default is "NotSet". 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|錯誤訊息周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the error messages.| |`CssClass`|階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別用來呈現錯誤訊息。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the error messages. 如果未指定其他設定，它們將會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體類型顯示錯誤訊息文字。`true` to display the error message text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜體字型顯示錯誤訊息文字。`true` to display the error message text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字體的名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示錯誤訊息文字，其上方的第一行。`true` to display the error message text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|中的錯誤訊息，做為文字的大小物件。The size of the text in the error messages as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要線顯示錯誤訊息文字。`true` to display the error message text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示錯誤訊息文字與底線。`true` to display the error message text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|中的錯誤訊息文字的色彩。The color of the text in the error messages. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|A物件，表示錯誤訊息的高度。A object that represents the height of the error messages.| |`Width`|A物件，表示錯誤訊息的寬度。A object that represents the width of the error messages.|

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指示在驗證使用者之後是否要顯示 控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the control after the user is authenticated.

value.span: 如果驗證使用者之後應隱藏 控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control should be hidden when the user is authenticated; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定是否已驗證的使用者顯示控制項。The property specifies whether the control is displayed to authenticated users. 若屬性是`false`、控制項將不會在頁面上已驗證的使用者存取網站時才會出現。When the property is `false`, the control does not appear on the page when an authenticated user accesses the site. 這用來隱藏用同時登入頁面和資訊頁面的 Web 網頁上控制項之後已驗證使用者。This is used on Web pages that are used both as login pages and as information pages to hide the control after the user has been authenticated. 屬性沒有任何作用Web.config 或應用程式的組態檔中，定義出現在預設登入頁面的控制項。The property has no effect on a control that appears on the default login page defined in Web.config or in the application's configuration file. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性`true`指定控制項未隱藏，且一律會顯示在頁面上，不論使用者是否已通過驗證。The following code example sets the property to `true` to specify that the control is not hidden and is always displayed on the page, regardless of whether the user has been authenticated. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginHideWhenLoggedIn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginHideWhenLoggedIn/CS/loginhidewhenloggedincs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginHideWhenLoggedIn#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginHideWhenLoggedIn/VB/loginhidewhenloggedinvb.aspx#1)]
